articles.title: Covid in Scotland: Barra outbreak 'serious and escalating' - BBC News
articles.description: More than 110 people are now in isolation on Barra, with islanders being urged to stay at home.
articles.content:

image captionAbout a 10th of the island's community is currently self-isolating
